name: Product Title
note: Main product title at the top of the page.

name: Short Description
note: Brief product description displayed below the title.

name: Full Description
note: Detailed product description section with features and benefits.

name: Features and Benefits
note: Bullet points of product features and benefits.

name: Product Images
note: Main product images and gallery images.

name: Main Product Image
note: The main product image displayed at the top of the page.

name: Gallery Images
note: Additional product images in the thumbnail gallery.

name: Current Price
note: Current price displayed on the product page.

name: Product SKU
note: The unique product identification code.

name: Technical Specifications Section
note: Section containing detailed technical specifications.

name: Technical Specifications Table
note: Table with technical specifications details.

name: Key Specifications
note: Summary of key product specifications like capacity and readability.

name: Capacity
note: The maximum weight capacity of the product.

name: Readability
note: The smallest weight increment the scale can measure.

name: Pan Size
note: Dimensions of the weighing platform.

name: Applications
note: List of suitable applications for the product.

name: Features
note: Icons and descriptions of product features.

name: Product Documents
note: Links to manuals, datasheets and other documents.

name: Accessories
note: Compatible accessories for the product.

name: Models Table
note: Table showing different models with their specifications.

name: Model Row
note: Individual model information in the models table.

name: Related Products
note: List of related products shown at the bottom of the page.

name: Warranty Information
note: Details about product warranty.

name: Specification Rows
note: Individual rows in the specification table with property and value.

name: Specification Category
note: Category headers in the specifications section.

name: Downloads
note: Links to downloadable files like manuals and datasheets.

name: Technical Information
note: Technical specification section containing detailed information about the product.

name: Model Name
note: Model name or number of the product.

name: UPC Code
note: Universal Product Code for the item.

name: Weighing Units
note: Available measurement units for the scale or balance.
